name: Victoria Memorial
desc: Iconic white marble monument and museum, major tourist attraction.

name: Nicco Park
desc: Popular amusement park known as the Disneyland of West Bengal.

name: Science City
desc: Interactive science museum and park, fun for students and families.

name: Eco Park
desc: Huge urban park with lake, gardens, recreation areas.

name: Indian Museum
desc: One of India’s oldest museums with rare collections of antiques and art.

name: Dakshineswar Kali Temple
desc: Famous riverside temple dedicated to Goddess Kali

name: Belur Math
desc: Headquarters of Ramakrishna Mission, peaceful spiritual vibe on the Ganges.

name: Birla Planetarium
desc: Space shows and astronomy exhibits — India’s largest planetarium.

name: Alipore Zoological Gardens
desc: One of India’s oldest zoos, great for family picnics and animal lovers.

name: Rabindra Sarobar
desc: Beautiful urban lake with jogging paths, peaceful spot for evenings.
